ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can salmon, drained and liquid reserved
½ cup all-purpose flour, or more as needed
2 cups shortening, or more as needed
¼ cup cornmeal, or as needed

cookingTips: Use the reserved salmon liquid to adjust mixture consistency if too dry
Coat hands lightly with cornmeal or flour when forming patties to prevent sticking
Fry in hot shortening at 350°F until golden brown, about 3-4 minutes per side
enrichment.coachingPrompt: These budget-friendly patties use canned salmon. How can you make them healthier while maintaining their crispy texture?
